description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.PU3uwrAcmGXMGo2n]{Specialization}

You can move from place to place without being noticed.

Associated Skills: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.76u4HnGcAlySicb4]{Engineering} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.qVEW9HjXQN0ok879]{Sleight of Hand}. You can attempt an Engineering check with a +4 bonus to make a trick attack by using a customized device to momentarily distract your enemy.

Specialization Exploit: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.583I8ujhHputWnep]{Utility Belt (Ex)}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.hKAKWZvBIzZLXKQe]{Quick Deployment (Ex)}: At 11th level, once per round you can retrieve or put away a stored item (including from your utility belt) or pick up an item as part of another move action, standard action, or full action.

Free Skill Ranks from Specialization's associated skills are auto applied in the modifiers tab
